posts.title: Mini Planetarium Projector
posts.content: Gain a deeper understanding of our cosmos by studying the night sky with this mini planetarium projector. It makes all the constellations clearly visible and can be set with a specific latitude, date, and time to see the night sky anywhere in the world.

posts.title: The Thumb Piano
posts.content: Creating beautiful music while you’re on-the-go is easier than ever with the thumb piano by your side. This compact and super portable instrument features a lovely mahogany wood body accented by a set of keys that you flick using your thumbs.

posts.title: LEGO Micro Cities Book
posts.content: This LEGO Micro Cities book is a must-have for any architect-in-training. This incredibly well illustrated and written book will show you how to construct incredibly intricate miniature cities complete with everything from bridges to towering skyscrapers.

posts.title: Natural Teeth Whitening Sticks
posts.content: Get a brighter smile without incorporating foreign chemicals into your body by using these natural teeth whitening sticks. You simply trim 1/2″ off the bark and chew it until it forms bristles that you can clean your teeth with, without requiring any toothpaste or water.

posts.title: Slender Man Costume
posts.content: Petrify the neighborhood children with horror when you sneak up on them wearing the Slender Man costume. This one piece lycra costume disguises you from head to toe in Slender Man’s trademark black suit and tie accompanied by his disturbing blank face.

posts.title: iMac Carrying Case
posts.content: Why settle for puny 13″ or 15″ screens when you can simply lug around your giant 27″ iMac everywhere you go using this fashionable carrying case. It’s expertly crafted from genuine leather and thick felt that is designed to protect your PC while you tote it around.

posts.title: Cigarette Shaped Lighter
posts.content: Make your disgusting smoking habit look a little cooler by sparking your cancer stick using this cigarette shaped lighter. This sleek refillable butane lighter comes disguised as a metallic cigarette with a pop off top that reveals a handy flame.

posts.title: Professional Pet Neck Tie
posts.content: Get your furry friend ready for the boardroom by placing him in this dapper professional pet neck tie. It fits comfortably over the neck and comes in a stylish yet conservative striped pattern that’s purrrfect for the corporate world.

posts.title: Sliding Barn Door Kit
posts.content: Give any room in your humble abode a quaint rustic touch by adding a sliding barn door. Using this high quality steel hardware kit and a little elbow grease, you’ll be able to replace your conventional door with an imposing country styled barn door.

posts.title: Farm Plus Hydroponic Garden
posts.content: Enjoy a steady supply of farm fresh herbs and veggies at your disposal by adding the Farm Plus hydroponic garden to your kitchen’s landscape. Available in 3 grow heights, this sophisticated indoor soil-free garden allows you to grow up to 24 different plants simultaneously!

posts.title: One Pound Bag Of Marshmallows
posts.content: Quit counting calories and indulge a little by scarfing down this entire one pound bag of marshmallows. This ginormous bag comes chock full of colorful little marshmallows ideal for snacking on – or for topping onto your baked goodies.

posts.title: Doggie Floor Dusting Slippers
posts.content: Make your dog more useful around the house by getting him to clean the floors as he walks while wearing these doggie floor dusting slippers. These “one size fits most” slippers contain special micro fiber pads that pick up dirt while your dog scurries about your home.
